name: StarkMeta
description: StarkMeta has built a corporate store solution, and has already built various technologies such as VR, AR character shaping, clothing room, store purchase, and virtual mobile phone payment system, adding uniqueness by applying it to a dynamic city based on Unreal Engine5. Players can purchase and wear various items such as power gloves, super boots, air shoes, wings, drones, superhero suits, Gulliver's mode, teleportation zone creation, supercars, bikes, etc. , high-altitude jump, parkour, super-fast run, teleport to another dimension world, etc. You can use special superhero skills.
